body:
Honeybee uses Daysim for annual simulations. Spectral information isn't considered in Daysim-based simulations: [http://daysim.ning.com/subprogram/radfiles2daysim](http://daysim.ning.com/subprogram/radfiles2daysim) . You can derive RGB values by running simulations with Radiance directly.

The sky and sun models used in conventional daylighting simulations are based on luminance (brightness) alone. So, any values that you do derive for RGB channels will still be limited in accuracy.
